definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: The grocer studies to please his customers.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商老闆考慮着要迎合顧客。

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 廚師和雜貨商爲蛋的價格討價還價。

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 廚師和雜貨商爲蛋價計較個沒完。
那個雜貨商總是要高價。

sentences.english: The gross grocer crossed his legs ago the boss.
sentences.chinese: 粗鄙的雜貨商在老總面前叉起腿子。

sentences.english: The grocer's has plenty varieties of goods in stock.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商有種類繁多的存貨。

sentences.english: The grocer, who was driving a wagon, got frustrated by the frost and slippery lane.
sentences.chinese: 駕着馬車的雜貨商因冰凍路滑而沮喪。

sentences.english: The grocer's has plenty varieties goods in stock.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商有種類繁奪的存貨。

sentences.english: A grocer built up a greenhouse nearby a gulf.
sentences.chinese: 一名雜貨商在一個海灣附近建造了一個溫室。

sentences.english: She made out a list for the grocer.
sentences.chinese: 她把要向雜貨商購買的東西列成一張單子。

sentences.english: I have spoken of the plight of the grocers.
sentences.chinese: 我已經說了許多雜貨商的困境。

sentences.english: The grocer's shelves were overstocked with merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 食品雜貨商的架子上商品充斥。

sentences.english: It offers an outdoor pool and free parking.
sentences.chinese: 酒店爲客人提供一個游泳池和雜貨商店。

sentences.english: The grocer sparred with her outside his store.
sentences.chinese: 雜貨商在店外和她吵了起來。

sentences.english: One can recognise a man as an Emperor orasa grocer.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以承認某人是一個皇帝，或是一個雜貨商。
